snippet: The S.E.C. has voluntarily dropped a case against Parker H. Petit, the former chairman and chief executive of Matria Healthcare, dealing the agency another recent setback.
abstract: The S.E.C. has voluntarily dropped a case against Parker H. Petit, the former chairman and chief executive of Matria Healthcare, dealing the agency another recent setback.

headline.main: S.E.C. Drops Insider Trading Case Against Health Care Executive
